content: one st earlier each odd numbered row until row 10 is complete o row 11 k4 w&t o row 12 p1 k3 o row 13 k3 w&t o row 14 k3 remove marker if you haven t already o row 15 k3 pick up 7 st k to end  to pu st knitwise knit up to st to pu insert right needle into the front of the wrap from the bottom and then insert the same needle into the st on the left needle knitwise knit this st then pass the wrap over the st you just knit o there are now 30 stitches on the needles o row 16 k3 p24 k3 o cut yarn copyright © 2009 2017 all rights reserved ~ laura treadway www lauratreadway com ~ potentialofyarn blogspot com a pattern for non commercial use please feel free to share but keep the copyright notice intact 3  i cord ties o using 2 dpns knit i cord 3 st wide for 10 12 inches o applied i cord this will bind off the live stitches at the top of the bib  note start at the upper right corner of the bib  k2 sts of the i cord slip the 3rd i cord stitch from left to right dpn as if to purl knit one live st from bib passed the slipped i cord st over the bib st go to next row of i cord and of the bib o after reaching the end of the bib continue to knit i cord until as long as the tie on the other side  finishing o sew end of i cord together weave in ends finished size is roughly 8 wide by 8 tall at tallest point with a cord of 30 35 long copyright © 2009 2017 all rights reserved ~ laura treadway www lauratreadway com ~ potentialofyarn blogspot com a pattern for non commercial use please feel free to share but keep the copyright notice intact 4
